title: Ahead Of Their Time - The Shift
description: Neil Paine tells the story of the rise, fall, and return of the defensive shift in baseball, which stumped Hall of Famer Ted Williams. The first in our five-part doc series.

itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Jody Avirgan
